pages.text: If having access to every item at your fingertips in $(item)JEI$() isn't your thing, and you prefer exploring and discovering as you go - you can turn off JEI by pressing $(thing)Ctrl-O$() in your inventory. You can, and should, still see recipes and uses by pressing $(thing)R$() or $(thing)U$() respectively.$(br2)If a more exploration focused experience is your jam, this is definitely recommended.
